EVM_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key (starting with 0x) used by the WalletProvider to sign governance proposal and bridge transactions.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME>.description: Custom RPC URL for the specified EVM chain (e.g., ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_MAINNET). Used when generating chain configurations.

EVM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME>.description: Custom RPC URL for the specified EVM chain (e.g., EVM_PROVIDER_BASE). Fallback option if ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME> is not provided.

TEE_MODE.description: Controls whether the Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) mode is enabled. Determines if a TEE-derived wallet should be used.

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Salt value used to deterministically derive an ECDSA keypair inside the TEE when TEE_MODE is enabled.

TEST_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key used by tests to initialize the WalletProvider. If not provided, a new random key is generated.
TEST_PRIVATE_KEY.default: Randomly generated private key when unset

FUNDED_TEST_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key for a pre-funded wallet used to run live integration bridge tests.

SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: Optional custom RPC endpoint URL for the Sepolia testnet used in tests.

BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: Optional custom RPC endpoint URL for the Base Sepolia testnet used in tests.

OP_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: Optional custom RPC endpoint URL for the Optimism Sepolia testnet used in tests.
